emailThread.subject: Re: Quote Request QR-2025-0042 - Hydraulic Parts

messages.subject: Quote Request QR-2025-0042 - Hydraulic Parts
messages.body:
Hello,

We need the following hydraulic parts for our CAT 320 Excavator:
- Hydraulic pump assembly
- Control valve
- Hydraulic cylinder seals

Please provide pricing and availability.

Best regards,
Jane Doe
messages.htmlBody:
Hello,

We need the following hydraulic parts for our CAT 320 Excavator:

  • Hydraulic pump assembly
  • Control valve
  • Hydraulic cylinder seals

Please provide pricing and availability.

Best regards,
Jane Doe

messages.subject: Re: Quote Request QR-2025-0042 - Hydraulic Parts
messages.body:
Hi Jane,

Thank you for your inquiry. Here's our quote:

1. Hydraulic Pump Assembly (CAT-123-4567) - $2,850.00
   - In stock, ships same day
   
2. Control Valve (CAT-234-5678) - $1,450.00
   - Available for pickup at Portland location
   
3. Hydraulic Cylinder Seal Kit (CAT-345-6789) - $125.00
   - In stock, can deliver next day

Total: $4,425.00

All prices include standard warranty. Let us know if you'd like to proceed.

Best regards,
John Smith
Heavy Equipment Parts & Supply

items.description: Hydraulic Pump Assembly for CAT 320 Excavator

orderDetails.pickupLocation: Heavy Equipment Parts & Supply - Portland Warehouse, 1234 Industrial Blvd, Portland, OR 97201
orderDetails.pickupInstructions: Please bring photo ID and order number. Items will be ready at the will-call counter.
orderDetails.notes: This order is for our CAT 320 Excavator (Serial: CAT0320EL12345678) currently on the Aurora Bridge project site. Hydraulic system needs immediate repair.
orderDetails.specialInstructions: FOR PICKUP ITEMS: Control valve (CAT-234-5678) will be picked up on Dec 31. FOR DELIVERY ITEMS: Please deliver hydraulic pump and seal kits to main office address. Contact Jane Doe at +1-555-0199 upon delivery.
